t: Amazon Launches First Physical Store In MA | PYMNTS.com
s: October 4, 2019 - Amazon has opened its first physical store in Massachusetts. Located at the Natick Mall in Natick, Massachusetts, the 4-star store is the fifth physical location nationwide for the eCommerce giant.
